Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 観光客
Entry.EnglishText: Tourist

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場
Entry.EnglishText: Tavern

Entry.JapaneseText: せっかくバルカまで来たんだもの。 カレギア城も見に行かないとね。
Entry.EnglishText: It took me a while to get to Balka. I should go see the castle while I'm here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るヒューマとの戦いに向け、 今、我らガジュマは 一丸となるべき時なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In the coming battle against the Huma, we Gajuma must fight as one!

Entry.JapaneseText: この大事な時期に、 ヒューマとつるむとは 感心できんな！
Entry.EnglishText: I find it deplorable that you would travel with Huma in these trying times!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの行動は常に 監視されているのを 忘れるなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: We are closely monitoring the actions of all Huma. Don't you forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬を売ってるところ？ 貴様、旅人か!?
Entry.EnglishText: You don't know where to buy medicine? What are you, a tourist?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、バルカのガジュマと ヒューマはの関係は、 非常に緊迫している。
Entry.EnglishText: There is currently a lot of tension between Gajuma and Huma in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: 用事が済み次第、即座に 宿屋にでも戻れるんだ！ わかったら、さっさと行け！
Entry.EnglishText: As soon as you've completed your errand, you must return to the inn immediately. Now get a move on!

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るヒューマとの戦いに向け、 今、我らガジュマは 一丸となるべき時なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In the coming battle against the Huma, we Gajuma must fight as one!

Entry.JapaneseText: この大事な時期に、 ヒューマとつるむとは 感心できんな！
Entry.EnglishText: I find it deplorable that you would travel with Huma in these trying times!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの行動は、常に 監視されているのを忘れるなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: We are closely monitoring the actions of all Huma. Don't you forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るヒューマとの戦いに向け、 今、我らガジュマは 一丸となるべき時なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In the coming battle against the Huma, we Gajuma must fight as one!

Entry.JapaneseText: この大事な時期に、 ヒューマとつるむとは 感心できんな！
Entry.EnglishText: I find it deplorable that you would travel with Huma in these trying times!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの行動は常に 監視されているのを 忘れるなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: We are closely monitoring the actions of all Huma. Don't you forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りの原因は、現在、 全力で調査中だ。
Entry.EnglishText: We are doing everything we can to investigate the cause of these tremors.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出を控えるよう 通達が出ているはずだ！ むやみに出歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma have been ordered to stay inside. You need to stay out of the streets!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か恐ろしい事が起きている。 だが、上からは命令が下りて来ない。 このままでいいのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: The situation is dire, but we aren't receiving any orders... What the hell is going on...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出を控えるよう 通達が出ているはずだ！ むやみに出歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma have been ordered to stay inside. You need to stay out of the streets!

Entry.JapaneseText: 四星のワルトゥ様が、全軍の 指揮を執られているそうだ。 指令系統の混乱が収まった。
Entry.EnglishText: I have been informed that Walto of the Four Stars is currently commanding the army. The issues with the chain of command have been resolved.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は、バイラスの排除と 種族の別なく<Yellow>ヒト<White>を守れとの 命令が出ている！
Entry.EnglishText: We've been told to defeat the Biruses and protect our fellow <Yellow>Man<White> irregardless of race!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一見、穏やかに見えるが この街のヒューマたちの ガジュマへの対抗意識は強い。
Entry.EnglishText: Although things seem calm at the moment, the Huma in this city harbor intense antagonism towards Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつ争いが起きてもおかしくない。 それがバルカの現状だ……
Entry.EnglishText: Fighting could break out at any moment. I never thought Balka would get like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐそこの石門から、 街の外へ出られる。
Entry.EnglishText: This stone gate will take you outside the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこの緑色した鉄のアーチを 抜ければ城の前に出られるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: And you can go through that green archway to get to Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: やや……おまえら…… ……違うかな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you guys are... Actually, nevermind...

Entry.JapaneseText: 対立し、争いを起こしているのは 一般市民だけではない……
Entry.EnglishText: Conflicts haven't been brewing solely amongst the citizenry...

Entry.JapaneseText: 実は、軍の中でも種族別に 派閥争いが起きているんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: There's been infighting in the military over race as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのガジュマに対する 対抗意識が争いの原因だ。
Entry.EnglishText: All of this fighting has been caused by Huma being antagonistic towards Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: くれぐれも、ガジュマを 挑発するような事は するんじゃないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: So please, don't do anything to provoke Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 城へ戻って来るようにと 言われていたんだが、 このままでは遅れちまう。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been ordered to return to the castle, but at this rate, I'm going to be late.
Entry.Notes: Unclear if this is related to the next line or not. I have translated it as such.

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く交替が 来てくれないかな…… そろそろ時間なんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Where the hell is my replacement...? He should be here by now...
Entry.Notes: See line before. May not be related but I translated it as such.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、あんたの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you're traveling with looks a lot like Her Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it can't be her, but the resemblence is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you're traveling with looks a lot like Her Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it can't be her, but the resemblence is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……違う…… アガーテじゃない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...She's not Agarte...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you're traveling with looks a lot like Her Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it can't be her, but the resemblence is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の指揮のもと、 我らガジュマは団結し、 ヒューマとの戦いに備えるのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Under Lady Zilva's leadership, we Gajuma will be united in preparation for the upcoming battle against the Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 平和なカレギアを 取り戻すために！
Entry.EnglishText: Peace in Callegea will be restored!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you're traveling with looks a lot like Her Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it can't be her, but the resemblence is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……違う…… アガーテじゃない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...She's not Agarte...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ヒューマの娘、 何をウロウロしている？ よそ者か？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma girl, what are you loitering about for? I take it you're not from around here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 機関車に乗りたいなら、 城門前から乗れるぞ。 覚えておきな！
Entry.EnglishText: If you want to ride the train, you can board it at the station in front of the castle gates. Don't forget that!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you're traveling with looks a lot like Her Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it can't be her, but the resemblence is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の指揮のもと、 我らガジュマは団結し、 ヒューマとの戦いに備えるのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Under Lady Zilva's leadership, we Gajuma will be united in preparation for the upcoming battle against the Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 平和なカレギアを 取り戻すために！
Entry.EnglishText: Peace in Callegea will be restored!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは、家で おとなしくしていろ。 許可なく街を歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are to remain indoors. Do not go outside without permission!

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配はいらない。 バルカで異変が起きていると言う 報告は、今のところない。
Entry.EnglishText: There is no need to be alarmed. There have been no unusual occurrences here in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちヒューマは、 地鳴りの前に、自分たちの 今後を心配したらどうだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: How about you Huma worry more about what's going to happen to you instead of these earthquakes?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配はいらない。 バルカで異変が起きていると言う 報告は、今のところない。
Entry.EnglishText: There is no need to be alarmed. There have been no unusual occurrences here in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちヒューマは、 ラジルダの事より、自分たちの 今後を心配したらどうだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: How about you Huma worry more about what's going to happen to you instead of what happened to Razilda?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街のいたるところに バイラスが出て、 大混乱が起きている……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Biruses are appearing in the city... All hell is breaking loose!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>の 再現のようだ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is like the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White> all over again!

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスのみならず、 ヒューマの暴徒どもが 混乱に拍車をかけているんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: As if the Biruses weren't enough, these Huma mobs are making things more chaotic!

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しでも良心があるなら、 おまえの同族どもを おとなしくさせろ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you had any conscience at all, you'd be keeping your kind in check!

Entry.JapaneseText: 四星のミリッツァ様が、 最前線で戦っておられるそうだ！ 俺もやらなくては……！
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa of the Four Stars is fighting on the front lines. I must do the same...!

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら軍が監視を強化しても、 いさかいが絶えないのはなぜだ…… やはり原因はヒューマか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Despite the military increasing surveillance, fights are still breaking out... Are the Huma really to blame...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、バタバタと 騒がしいなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: That was quite the scene just now...

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵隊とちっこいガジュマの男が この通りを街の広場の方へ 走って行ってさ……
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a soldier and a small Gajuma male runnning towards the city plaza...

Entry.JapaneseText: これって言うのも、 ヨソ者が増えたせいだな……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess this is what happens when you get a lot of people from out of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、よそ者が増えて困るよ。 ま、枯れ木も山のにぎわいって 言うからね。
Entry.EnglishText: There's been a lot of trouble caused by people from out of town lately, but I guess the more the merrier.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様のお披露目の儀式を 盛り上げるには いいかもしれないな。
Entry.EnglishText: And I guess the Queen's inauguration ceremony is cause for merriment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 品のないよその連中が 城で暴れたってね。
Entry.EnglishText: Some trashy people from out of town were causing trouble in the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 実際、品のあるこの街には 似つかわしくない連中が 増えたよ……まったく……
Entry.EnglishText: In fact, I feel I see more and more people who don't belong in a city as sophisticated as this one...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマかよ…… バルカとガジュマ…… 似つかわしくないなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, a Gajuma... Your kind doesn't belong here in Balka...

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下はご病気だと言われてるが、 本当は国王になるのがイヤで 逃げたって言う噂もあるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: They say that the Queen is ill, but I've heard a rumor that she ran away because she didn't want to rule.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今こそ……ヒューマの王を…… いやいや……なんでもない……
Entry.EnglishText: If that's the case, then maybe we need a Huma ruler... Actually, forget I said anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……言わなくてもわかるだろう？ 今時、ガジュマと話すヒューマ なんていないぜ！ フン！
Entry.EnglishText: I shouldn't have to tell you that there's not a single Huma that wants to talk to a Gajuma! Hmph!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、アガーテ女王は ベルサスにいたんだってな。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Queen Agarte was in Belsas.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり病気じゃなかったんだな。 本当に国王になりたくなかったの かもしれないな……
Entry.EnglishText: I knew she wasn't sick. I guess she didn't want to rule after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: 信ぴょう性は薄いけど、 ベルサスのヒューマが女王を 処刑しようとしたってウワサもある。
Entry.EnglishText: There's been rumors that the Huma in Belsas tried to execute the Queen, but I don't find them to be credible.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に処刑されてたら、 今ごろヒューマの王様が 誕生してたかも……
Entry.EnglishText: If they really did execute her, we would have a Huma ruler by now...

Entry.JapaneseText: さては君たち、田舎者だね？ この街の大きさに 戸惑っているんだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all from the countryside? Hopefully the vastness of the city isn't overwhelming.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、困ったら、 都生まれ、都育ちの このボクに聞きたまえ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I was born and raised in this city, so if you need any help, feel free to ask.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『進路案内板』 ←カレギア城方面 →バルカ出口方面
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Directions - ← To Callegea Castle → To Balka's Entrance

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く……薬を 届けてあげないと……
Entry.EnglishText: I need to hurry up and deliver the medicine...

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬……誰か薬がどこにあるか、 知ってる人はいないかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: There has to be someone around here who knows where I can find medicine...
